org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internals

类 SimpleConsumerThread<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internals.SimpleConsumerThread<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The type of elements that this consumer thread creates from Kafka's byte messages and emits into the Flink DataStream.
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class SimpleConsumerThread<T>
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class implements a thread with a connection to a single Kafka broker. The thread pulls records for a set of topic partitions for which the connected broker is currently the leader. The thread deserializes these records and emits them.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels this fetch thread. The thread will release all resources and terminate.

      • requestAndSetSpecificTimeOffsetsFromKafka

        private static void requestAndSetSpecificTimeOffsetsFromKafka(kafka.javaapi.consumer.SimpleConsumer consumer,
                                                              java.util.List<KafkaTopicPartitionState<kafka.common.TopicAndPartition>> partitions,
                                                              long whichTime)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Request offsets before a specific time for a set of partitions, via a Kafka consumer.
        参数:
        consumer - The consumer connected to lead broker
        partitions - The list of partitions we need offsets for
        whichTime - The type of time we are requesting. -1 and -2 are special constants (See OffsetRequest)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • requestAndSetEarliestOrLatestOffsetsFromKafka

        private static void requestAndSetEarliestOrLatestOffsetsFromKafka(kafka.javaapi.consumer.SimpleConsumer consumer,
                                                                  java.util.List<KafkaTopicPartitionState<kafka.common.TopicAndPartition>> partitions)
                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        For a set of partitions, if a partition is set with the special offsets OffsetRequest.EarliestTime() or OffsetRequest.LatestTime(), replace them with actual offsets requested via a Kafka consumer.
        参数:
        consumer - The consumer connected to lead broker
        partitions - The list of partitions we need offsets for
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • requestAndSetOffsetsFromKafka

        private static void requestAndSetOffsetsFromKafka(kafka.javaapi.consumer.SimpleConsumer consumer,
                                                  java.util.List<KafkaTopicPartitionState<kafka.common.TopicAndPartition>> partitionStates,
                                                  java.util.Map<kafka.common.TopicAndPartition,kafka.api.PartitionOffsetRequestInfo> partitionToRequestInfo)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Request offsets from Kafka with a specified set of partition's offset request information. The returned offsets are used to set the internal partition states.

        This method retries three times if the response has an error.

        参数:
        consumer - The consumer connected to lead broker
        partitionStates - the partition states, will be set with offsets fetched from Kafka request
        partitionToRequestInfo - map of each partition to its offset request info
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • checkAllPartitionsHaveDefinedStartingOffsets

        private static void checkAllPartitionsHaveDefinedStartingOffsets(java.util.List<KafkaTopicPartitionState<kafka.common.TopicAndPartition>> partitions)
